Field Work


New Mexico (Spring 2024)

In early March, we ventured out west to collect fluorite specimens from a variety of historic fluorite-fluorspar and barite-barium mines in central to western New Mexico.

Field Team: Jenna Everard, Bill Holt, John Rakovan, Rex Nelson (& his dog!)

Hansonburg mines, bright blue fluorite vein above

Zuni mines

Exiting one of the mines

John sitting in some slickensides

Hansonburg mines, purple fluorite

Hansonburg mines, green fluorite

Hansonburg mines, blue fluorite

Ice cream igloo fluorite

Zuni mines, vein of blue fluorite in rock

Gold!

Photos by Jenna and John


Nevada (Winter 2024)

We explored a variety of historic (and modern, thanks to Angelo Gold Ashanti) gold mines in and around Beatty, Nevada on our hunt for fluorite from the American Southwest. This field trip also included some tourist side quests to Death Valley and the Hoover Dam!

Field Team: Stephen Cox, Jenna Everard, Sidney Hemming, Troy Rasbury, Bill Holt, Katie Wooton, Paul Tomascak, Steven Jaret, Sean Tvelia, Kevin Hatton, Angelo Gold Ashanti Geologists

Field team at the old Fluorite Post Office

Large slickenside outcrop

Death Valley

Ubehebe Crater, Death Valley

Climbing in the hills (can you spot us?)

Bright turquoise layer

Walking through an open pit mine

A friendly burro!

Purple fluorite

Amber fluorite

Testing fluorescence at dinner

The Hoover Dam

Photos by Jenna and Stephen


Colorado (Summer 2023)

We visited outcrops of the Great Unconformity and spatially associated sandstone dykes around Colorado Springs.

Field Team: Jenna Everard, Christine Siddoway

The Great Unconformity

Looking for dykes

Intersecting dykes - a temporal relationship!

Hiking over Iron Mountain

Photos by Jenna


Italy (Spring 2023)

We traveled across the Apennines and Central Italy to learn about the geologic past and present of the region.

The AGES Lab

Measuring Milankovitch Cycles

Frasassi Caves

Sitting on the K-Pg boundary

Norcia

Looking for gypsum on the beach
